summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ANITA Art of Beauty landing page modifications. All requested features implemented and working correctly. Backend APIs, admin dashboard, and frontend integration all functioning properly.
passed_tests: ✅ 'Szempillaépítés' written as one word everywhere (tabs, service titles, hero, footer)
✅ 'Töltés (3 hét)' appears in eyelash pricing list
✅ 'Töltés (4-5 hét)' appears in eyelash pricing list
✅ Gallery navigation menu item works correctly
✅ Contact form POST to /api/contact works with Hungarian responses
✅ New eyelash image loads in services section
✅ All backend API endpoints (15/15 tests passed)
